title: Streaming Myself Tryin 2 Git' Gud
body:
Hi everyone,

I don't see any streamers advertising themselves here so I don't know if I'm allowed to but why not. 

I'm Mageofpie, And not very good but hoping that streaming can encourage me to improve. I'm not a big streamer by any means so if you come in I'll be sure to talk to you. My peak this season was Diamond 4 100LP so I'm not a total noob and might be able to answer some of your questions. Right now I'm down in platinum though, because my mmr was too low for diamond so I'm getting there again. 

I do RP giveaways here and there, but I'm hoping that you'll stick around in my stream for more than just those. When there's enough viewers or interest I turn on songrequests and you're more than welcome to join in.

Even if you don't like my stream, I'm willing to take criticism as best I can, let me know what i can do better as a streamer or as a player. 

twitch.tv/mageofpie
Current: Diamond 5
Mains: Jungle/AD Carry

replies.body: Going again, please avoid the toxic players tonight~
Sorry guys, didn't realise i had some audio issues, should be all good now. ^.^
such stream. or am i bugged? i cant see a link or anything....
